message: People who doesn't even know where Venezuela is should abstain from comments... Venezuela is not rich, it might have tons of oil but instead of that being a good thing, it's a curse... Obamacare has raised the numbers of jobs. Why, I say this, is because now people have to get two jobs to survive because every place is only offering part time work in fear of being made to provide health insurance.
